page.title: 01BURTON LATIMER & ISHAM.
page.content: BURTON LATIMER is a town with a population of 9 200, situated on the A6 trunk road in the County of Northamptonshire,3 km south of Kettering & 8 km from Wellingborough. A variety of housing exists dating from pre 1800 up to the present day. Its traditional industry of Boot & Shoe manufacturing has declined in the last 20 years.The largest employer is "Weetabix"(Breakfast cereal). Its shopping centre has 1 supermarket & a limited number of other shops. ISHAM is on the A509 about 2km west of Burton Latimer.The 2 are separated by the River Ise & the railway.It is a small village of 800 people. Farmland covers 75% of this area, mainly of an arable type.
